document_data.name: Delavaundar
document_data.mainbody: '''Delavaundar''' was a member of the [[War Wizards]] of [[Cormyr]], active in the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1348}}, Delavaundar, alongside [[Marlegast]], was assigned by [[Vangerdahast Aeiulvana]], the Royal Magician of Cormyr, to dig for information on two of the newest members of the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]]. Then, the troupe bore the name of the Swords of Eveningstar, and its newest additions included "Pennae," or [[Alura Durshavin]] of [[Arabel]], and [[Martess Ilmra]]. Delavaundar and Marlegast dug up both lasses' family history and parts of their past, delivering the intel to Vangerdahast and his aide [[Laspeera Inthr√©]].
